select p.payment_id, p.contract_id, p.payment_method_name, p.payment_amount, p.has_penalty, p.penalty_amount, p.payment_status, p.expected_quarter, p.actual_quarter, p.submit_acceptance_date, p.actual_payment_date, p.confirm_year, p.del_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark, c.contract_name, c.contract_code, c.contract_status, c.contract_amount, c.contract_sign_date, c.free_maintenance_period, c.dept_id, cu.customer_simple_name as customer_name, d.dept_name, u.nick_name as update_by_name from pm_payment p left join pm_contract c on p.contract_id = c.contract_id left join pm_customer cu on c.customer_id = cu.customer_id left join sys_dept d on c.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user u on p.update_by COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = u.user_name
and p.contract_id = #{contractId} and c.contract_name like concat('%', #{contractName}, '%') and c.contract_code like concat('%', #{contractCode}, '%') and c.contract_status = #{contractStatus} and cu.customer_simple_name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%') and p.payment_method_name like concat('%', #{paymentMethodName}, '%') and p.has_penalty = #{hasPenalty} and p.payment_status = #{paymentStatus} and p.expected_quarter = #{expectedQuarter} and p.actual_quarter = #{actualQuarter} and p.confirm_year = #{confirmYear}
and date_format(p.actual_payment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{params.actualPaymentDateStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(p.actual_payment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{params.actualPaymentDateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by p.create_time desc

select p.payment_id, p.contract_id, p.payment_method_name, p.payment_amount, p.has_penalty, p.penalty_amount, p.payment_status, p.expected_quarter, p.actual_quarter, p.submit_acceptance_date, p.actual_payment_date, p.confirm_year, p.del_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark, c.contract_name, c.contract_code, c.contract_amount from pm_payment p left join pm_contract c on p.contract_id = c.contract_id where p.payment_id = #{paymentId}
